item.title: Sat, 31 May 2025 17:02:56 UTC
item.description:
It took me a long time to compile wapiti and dependencies,
and I had to use mitmproxy's whl. I hope in the future
to be able to compile it. Try it out and let me know.
Thank you. Happy Slack!
